name: receipt-service-requests
description: 收据生成服务API测试请求集合

requests.name: 健康检查
requests.description: 检查服务是否正常运行

requests.name: 服务信息
requests.description: 获取服务基本信息和可用端点

requests.name: 预览收据信息
requests.description: 预览收据信息，不生成PDF文件。返回包含收据ID和中文大写金额的完整信息

requests.name: 生成收据PDF（最小参数）
requests.description: 使用最小必需参数生成收据，其他字段使用默认值

curl_examples.name: 预览收据信息
curl_examples.command: curl -X POST http://localhost:8080/api/receipt/info -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"rent": 1500.00, "room_number": "101", "recipient": "张三", "payer": "李四"}'

curl_examples.name: 生成并下载收据PDF
curl_examples.command: curl -X POST http://localhost:8080/api/receipt/generate -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"rent": 1500.00, "room_number": "101", "recipient": "张三", "payer": "李四"}' --output receipt.pdf
